name: Pong Defense
description:
Pong defense is a survival game with only one goal: make it as big as possible while dodging the hexagonal enemies using your paddle.

The challenge is: As you get bigger, your paddle will be smaller and smaller, more enemy type will come, and it's spawn in a faster rate.

Instruction

Hover your mouse over the enemy's location.

Poweups will spawn, make sure powerups hit the body and not the paddle.

Powerups

Green: Slows the Enemies

Pink: Gives an additional 5 hp

Blue: Spawn a barrier for 5 seconds

Yellow: Destroy all the enemies, halt the spawn for 5 seconds

Enemies

Red: Has 2 Damage

Black: Has 5 Damage but a bit slower

Purple: Has only 1 Damage but quite faster
